sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="CM Tickets">7f65e9972f1210109e8256e62799b65f</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

    // assumptions: 
    // 1. there is a 1:1 correlation of ini to item
    // 2. ini is blank for incomplete tickets 
    // 3. some items contain a semi-colon delimited list of items and some contain 'all' to indocate all items for the ini
    // 4. every record contains a unique CM Ticket Number

    var ini = source.u_ini_restrictions.toString();
    // ToDo:  How to handle records with only one ini/item pair.  May not have a newline delimiter.

    // if ini is blank, ignore the record
    if (ini.length == 0) {
        ignore = true;
    } else {

        // ToDo: delete all prior rows for this cm ticket in cm ticket items table

        // the main ini and item values are a newline delimited array
        var iniArr = ini.split("\n");
        var item = source.u_item_restrictions.toString();
        var itemArr = item.split("\n");

        for (var i = 0; i < iniArr.length; i++) {
            // ToDo: iterate through the ini array and insert each ini/item(s) pair
            if (itemArr[i].includes(";")) {
                // the item is an array delimited by semi-colons
                var itemElements = itemArr[i].split(";");
                for (n = 0; n < itemElements.length; n++) {
                    // one record per ini/item element pair
                }
            } else {
                // item is 'all', so only one ini/item pair exists
            }
        }
    }





})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-08-03 15:00:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>a5fca9db2f1210109e8256e62799b6a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_a5fca9db2f1210109e8256e62799b6a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-08-03 15:31:40</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
